fees.description: Other fees may apply. Information is set out on our fees page: powershop.com.au/fees.

electricityContract.terms: If you're on a Time of Use tariff and have a basic accumulation (type 6) meter, your peak, off-peak and shoulder times may be determined by your distributor and differ from the above times shown with the prices. To check applicable times, visit www.powershop.com.au/timings-information. For full offer terms and conditions, visit powershop.com.au/terms-and-conditions

discounts.description: $100 sign up credit is available to new and moving customers only, and is applied to your bill  90 days after your Powershop online account has become active. We will send you an email letting you know when youï¿½re officially a customer.

electricityContract.variation: We may vary your prices at any time in accordance with our regulatory requirements. If we vary your prices we'll give you advance notice, usually by email.

eligibility.description: Must be a new Powershop residential customer, or an existing Powershop residential customer who is moving premises, and taking up your first electricity market contract with Powershop for the premises you switch. For full terms, see https://www.powershop.com.au/customer-terms-and-conditions/energy-offers-terms-and-conditions

timeOfUseRates.description: 7am - 4pm and 8pm - 10 pm on weekdays, and 7am to 10pm on weekends

greenPowerCharges.description: 100% GreenPower for 5.5c/kWh inc. GST (no discounts apply to GreenPower charges). You can purchase as much, or as little, 100% GreenPower as you like.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This Powershop offer is an ongoing contract (until you or we end it) with no exit fees.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Other fees may apply. Information is set out on our fees page: powershop.com.au/fees.
